Package org.jay3d.engine.core.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseLight  
    Camera  
    DirectionalLight  
    FreeLook
    'Temporary' class that handles the object's mouse movement that is controlled by the user.
    FreeMove
    'Temporary' class that directly handles the keyboard input movement for any object via the user.
    GameComponent
    GameComponent is the super class for any component to be rendered within the scene graph.
    LookAtComponent
    Mainly a convenience class that makes use of Quaternion#normalLinearInterpolation via the update method.
    MeshRenderer
    Created by Juxhin Do not distribute code without permission!
    PointLight
    PointLight is a child class of BaseLight, which uses attenuation on top of colour and intensity.
    SpotLight
    SpotLight is a child class of PointLight, which uses cutoff on top of colour, attenuation and intensity.
